page.title: 12Upcott Farm
page.content: When we got to Upcott farm a lady called Janice Hayes showed us around Warrens Meat Supplies.We went into{ 5 or 6 freezers .In the{freezers}were {bullocks. } A whole{bullock}can weigh upto 1000 pounds.Janice Hayes told us how much animals weigh, a{pig}weighs from 120 pounds to 140 pounds, a {lamb}weighs around 60 pounds, a{turkey weighs around 20 pounds . Janice showed us around the{ {machines, }a machine for cutting and one for packing and a machine that cuts bones into little pieces . The lady working there told us how they killed the animals by gassing them and then they cut them from their head down to their leg . When they have cut up the{carcases}they send the meat as far away as Cornwall Dorset and South Wales
